reviews.content: Update broke the arrangement of the toggles in the opened platter for me due to my tweaklist.
for prysm this tweak will not show in modular configuration

Powermodule is 100% one of the first tweaks I install. Gotta have that quick respring and uicache button. Only down side is that the restart button hasn’t worked for me since 12.1.2, but that hasn’t worked in many iOS tweaks for me since then (Unc0ver)
Easy access is the idea here and it was implemented very well. Although I have a glitch causing the icons not to go fullscreen when I 3D touch them
Not updated yet for coolstar’s UIKit Tools
Everything works except reboot button (does nothing) and UI cache (uses slow and legacy version, though it does work)
Doesn’t use sbreload (Chimera/Electra) and doesn’t support new uicache for Chimera and Electra.
No sbreload, uicache tools, or reboot.
Works just fine apart from the reboot module is faulty - it does nothing.
Reboot (ldrestart) doesn’t seem to work everything else works just fine ??
Reloading the UI cache doesn‘t work. Rest works just fine.
